title: Rabies

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Bite, roleblocking them. They gain "Hunger".

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- RB control immune
- If two players with Hunger visit each other, one will randomly deal a basic attack to the other. If a Psychopathic member is one of the two, they will always be the one to attack.
- While you control The Psychopath, if you kill your target, all players visiting the target (including you) gain Hunger.

fields.name: Kill Note Addition:
fields.value: *There's NO time to STAND around. The TIME to RUN is NOW.*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 5184
*Open the cage. Be urgent. Run.*
